statements: SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, disease_diagnosis FROM patient_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE disease_diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_id, gender FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, disease_diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE gender='Female'
SELECT age, COUNT(*) as total_patients FROM patient_data GROUP BY age HAVING total_patients > 1 ORDER BY age
SELECT DISTINCT disease_diagnosis FROM patient_data
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE disease_diagnosis LIKE '%flu%'
SELECT name, age FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, address FROM patient_demographics WHERE age > 50;
SELECT disease_name, diagnosis_date FROM disease_prevalence WHERE severity='Severe' ORDER BY diagnosis_date ASC;
SELECT disease_id, disease_name, severity FROM disease_prevalence WHERE severity='Moderate';
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM patient_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT disease_name, diagnosis_date FROM disease_prevalence ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, disease_name FROM patient_demographics JOIN disease_prevalence ON patient_demographics.patient_id = disease_prevalence.patient_id WHERE severity = 'Severe';

SELECT patient_id, name, age, disease_name, diagnosis_date FROM patient_demographics JOIN disease_prevalence ON patient_demographics.patient_id = disease_prevalence.patient_id ORDER BY age DESC, diagnosis_date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patients
SELECT disease_id, disease_name, category FROM diseases
SELECT * FROM patients
SELECT * FROM diseases
SELECT patient_id, disease_id, record_date FROM patient_disease_mapping
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM diseases WHERE category = 'Infectious Disease' ORDER BY disease_name ASC

SELECT patient_name, disease_name, record_date FROM patients JOIN patient_disease_mapping ON patients.patient_id = patient_disease_mapping.patient_id WHERE disease_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY record_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS num_patients FROM patient_disease_mapping GROUP BY disease_id HAVING COUNT(patient_id) > 2

SELECT patient_name, age, gender, disease_name, record_date FROM patients JOIN patient_disease_mapping ON patients.patient_id = patient_disease_mapping.patient_id JOIN diseases ON patient_disease_mapping.disease_id = diseases.disease_id ORDER BY patient_name ASC, record_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT disease_name, description FROM Diseases ORDER BY disease_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, disease_id, diagnosis_date FROM PatientDiseases WHERE diagnosis_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name, first_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name || ' ' || last_name AS full_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, disease_id, diagnosis_date FROM PatientDiseases WHERE diagnosis_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT Patients.first_name, Patients.last_name, Diseases.disease_name, Reports.report_date FROM Patients JOIN Reports ON Patients.patient_id = Reports.patient_id JOIN Diseases ON Reports.disease_id = Diseases.disease_id;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients, COUNT(DISTINCT disease_id) AS total_diseases FROM PatientDiseases;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_address FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT disease_name, disease_description FROM Diseases WHERE disease_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date FROM Reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, disease_name, disease_description FROM Patients p JOIN Patient_Diseases pd ON p.patient_id = pd.patient_id JOIN Diseases d ON pd.disease_id = d.disease_id;
SELECT r.report_name, r.report_date, p.patient_name FROM Reports r JOIN Patients p ON r.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE r.report_date >= '2021-01-01';

SELECT p.patient_name, d.disease_name, dm.patient_age_group FROM Patients p JOIN Patient_Diseases pd ON p.patient_id = pd.patient_id JOIN Diseases d ON pd.disease_id = d.disease_id JOIN Demographics dm ON p.patient_id = dm.patient_id;
